title: 1 Bedroom w/ A/C, On-Site Laundry, Controlled Entry
posting_body: 40 Ogden Street managed by Cornerstone Apartments
Welcome to Toscana, an exceptional apartment building with many different amenities.
From air conditioning, to hardwood floors, to open parking, Toscana has a lot to offer.
And if you're looking for a walkable distance to Wash Park, you're looking in the right place.
Even closer still, are the pleasant Alamo Placita Park and the Hungarian Freedom Park, just down the street.
And if you're looking for restaurants, look no further, there are plenty to choose all within a close vicinity!
To schedule a showing please contact our leasing team at

Platt Park, Highlands, City Park, West Wash Park, Capitol Hill, Uptown, University of Denver, Hale, LoHi, Sloan's Lake, Baker, Jefferson Park, Cheesman Park, Congress Park, Downtown, Five Points, RiNo
